page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: The Lostwithiel Junior and Infant School(The Primary School) has approximately{one hundred and thirty pupils aged between five and twelve years organised in five classes with five full time teachers including the Head Teacher and a part time teacher who assists with pupils who are failing to learn to read. A Partial Hearing Unit is attached to the school with a full time teacher qualified in teaching children with partial hearing difficulties. The falling numbers of children in the age group has reduced the number of pupils from approximately{one {hundred and eighty}ten years ago to the present figure. Approximately fifty per cent of the children take "School Dinners". {A C.of E. school at Downend has {approx. seventy pupils.
